snippet: Although the cancellation of the New York City Marathon was well-received by many runners, it was another blow to the 218 Livestrong runners who had entered the marathon.
lead_paragraph: Although the cancellation of the New York City Marathon was well-received by many runners, it was another blow to the 218 Livestrong runners who had entered the marathon.

headline.seo: Charitable Efforts Go On Without Event
headline.main: Charitable Efforts Go On Without Event
headline.print_headline: Charitable Efforts Go On Without Event
